title.narrative: Program ARC Ethiopia

description.narrative: This is a project by ZOA Ethiopia implemented under the ARC consortium programme named Hope and Opportunities for the People in Ethiopia.
1st installment ZOA ETH Coordination
2nd installment ZOA ETH Coordination
3rd installment for IMC
3rd installment for NRC
3rd installment for Plan
3rd installment for ZOA ETH
3rd installment received from BuZa
4th installment BuZa

comment.narrative: There are no stakeholders yet who see an improvement "through the programme" because the programme hasn't started during baseline.
